As a character who fears death and the Raven Queen, Armathys would likely have a strong motivation to avoid death at all costs. Here are a few ways he might try to do so:

1. Improving his combat skills: Armathys might seek to hone his combat skills and increase his survival rate in battle, in order to reduce his chances of dying.
2. Building alliances: Armathys might seek to build alliances with powerful individuals or organizations that can provide him with protection, resources, and support.
3. Obtaining magical protections: Armathys might seek out magical protections, such as magical items or spells, that can help him stay alive or resist the Raven Queen's pull.
4. Pursuing a personal quest: Armathys might seek to achieve a personal goal or complete a quest that he believes will free him from his curse and the Raven Queen's grasp.

Ultimately, Armathys' approach to avoiding death will depend on his character development, the resources and opportunities available to him, and the choices he makes.
